nodes.description: 一名自杀式炸弹袭击者在Shah Hasankhel村一个拥挤的操场上引爆了他的载有炸药的汽车，当时观众正在观看一场排球比赛。
nodes.support_text: The suicide bomber detonated his explosive-laden vehicle in the middle of the playground where spectators were watching a volleyball match in the Shah Hasankhel village, about 25km off Lakki Marwat.

nodes.description: 爆炸摧毁了十几所房屋，损坏了另外30所，并在现场形成了一个八英尺深的弹坑。
nodes.support_text: Over a dozen houses were destroyed in the blast, rendering the residents homeless. Another 30 houses were damaged. An eight-foot-deep crater was created at the site of the blast.

nodes.description: 星期六，当地居民从被毁房屋的废墟中又挖出了两具尸体，使死亡人数达到91人。
nodes.support_text: The area people pulled two more bodies from the rubble of destroyed houses on Saturday. The death toll from Friday’s suicide attack on a crowded playground in Lakki Marwat reached 91 on Saturday.

nodes.description: 星期六，当地居民在Shah Hasan Khel村为受害者举行了葬礼祈祷。
nodes.support_text: Local residents gather beside the bodies of the victims of Friday's suicide car bombing during a funeral prayer in Shah Hasan Khel village near Lakki Marwat on Saturday, Jan. 2, 2010.

nodes.description: Lakki Marwat警方针对身份不明的恐怖分子登记了一份第一信息报告（FIR）。
nodes.support_text: Meanwhile, the Lakki Marwat police registered an FIR against unknown terrorists.

nodes.description: 消息来源报道了恐怖袭击事件中的伤亡情况，包括死亡和受伤人员的具体身份。
nodes.support_text: The sources said that five Frontier Constabulary personnel and two policemen were among the dead while two personnel each of FC and police were wounded in the terrorist act.

edges.support_text: The suicide bomber detonated his explosive-laden vehicle... Over a dozen houses were destroyed in the blast... An eight-foot-deep crater was created at the site of the blast.
The death toll from Friday’s suicide attack on a crowded playground in Lakki Marwat reached 91 on Saturday.
Local residents gather beside the bodies of the victims of Friday's suicide car bombing during a funeral prayer... on Saturday, Jan. 2, 2010.
Meanwhile, the Lakki Marwat police registered an FIR against unknown terrorists.
Based on the temporal_order of the verb events (wound: 1, say: 2), the attack event (wound) happened before the reporting event (say).
